text: Zamagra Babiloni vahe'enema ha'ma nehu'za anara hugahaze. Ana nehanageno Nagri narimpa ahe'zamo'a teve rukru hiankna nehanige'na, Jerusalemi kumapi vahera narimpa ahezmante'na zamahe frisugeno rankumapina frisaza vahe zamavufagamo'a avitegahie. Na'ankure Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahe'mo'zama nehaza havi avu'ava zamo hanige'na, navugosa rukrahe nehu'na namefi huzamigahue.
